name: Carthay Circle Lounge
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Buena Vista Street

items.title: Spring Roll with Spicy Crab
items.description: Pickled Cucumber, Edamame, Thai Basil

items.title: Vietnamese Twice-cooked Beef Lettuce Wraps
items.description: with Pineapple-Mint Salsa

items.title: Moroccan Roasted Chicken Meatballs
items.description: Pomegranate Relish, Tzatziki

items.title: Carthay Sopes
items.description: Red Mole Braised Duck, Pepitas, Cilantro Crema

items.title: Chilled Shrimp Escabechē
items.description: Mango, Cucumber, and Agua Chile

items.title: Ratatouille “Gratin”
items.description: Pine Nuts, Basil, Haloumi Cheese

items.title: Bao Buns of Soy-Ginger Braised Pork Belly
items.description: Cucumber Kimchi

items.title: “Naanza"
items.description: Fresh Garbanzo Hummus, Moroccan Tomato Chutney, Fetta

items.title: Watermelon-Tomato Salad
items.description: Fresh Corn, Pepitas, Charred Avocado Vinaigrette

items.title: Miso Glazed Sustainable Fish*
items.description: Soba Noodles, Thai Basil, Spicy Kombu Broth

items.title: Strozzapreti Pasta
items.description: San Marzano Tomatoes, Basil, Parmigiano-Reggiano

items.title: North African Roasted Organic Chicken Breast
items.description: Tumeric Rice, spicy Harissa

items.title: Filet Mignon Beef Skewers
items.description: Aji Amarillo, Peruvian Stewed Beans

items.title: Peach and Caramel Sundae
items.description: Pecan Ice Cream, Brown Sugar Chantilly, Sugar Cookie

items.title: Mickey Hazelnut Crunch
items.description: Ice Cream Pop

items.title: Pepperoni Pizza Pinwheels
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit and choice of Small Low-fat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Rigatoni Pasta with Marinara
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit and choice of Small Low-fat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Chicken Skewers Pineapple-Ginger Glazed
items.description: served with Seasonal Fruit and choice of Small Low-fat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Mickey Hazelnut Crunch
items.description: Ice Cream Pop

items.title: Classic Martini
items.description: Classically prepared with Hendrick’s Gin or Double Cross Vodka, Lillet Blanc Dry Vermouth, and Gourmet Blue Cheese-Truffle Olives served with an Ice Sphere made from locally sourced Purified Water

items.title: Carthay Mai Tai
items.description: Surfrider Rum, Luxardo Maraschino and Orgeat (Almond) Syrups, Pineapple and fresh Citrus Juices, tapped with Myer's Original Dark Rum, garnished with an Orange Wedge and Luxardo Cherry

items.title: Negroni
items.description: Beefeater Gin, Campari, and Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth served over Hard Cubed Ice

items.title: Aviation Cocktail
items.description: Plymouth Gin, Crème de Violette Liqueur, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, and fresh Lemon Juice, served up

items.title: Ernest's Daiquiri
items.description: Bacardi Superior Rum, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, fresh Lime and Grapefruit Juice, and Organic Agave Nectar, served up

items.title: Citrus Berry Punch
items.description: Pimm’s No. 1 Liqueur, Plymouth Gin, Strawberry, and Lemonade served over Crushed Ice

items.title: Side Car
items.description: Hennessy V.S. Cognac, Cointreau, fresh Lemon Juice, and Agave Nectar with a Lemon Peel and a Sugar Rim

items.title: Ginger Rogers
items.description: Plymouth Gin, Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth, and a hint of fresh Lemon Juice, served up

items.title: The Derby
items.description: Bulleit Bourbon, fresh Grapefruit Juice, and Honey, served up

items.title: Scotch Mist
items.description: Known to be Walt’s Drink of Choice – Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch with a Lemon Peel served over Crushed Ice

items.title: Pisco Sour
items.description: El Gobernador Pisco, fresh Lime Juice, Organic Agave Nectar, Angostura Bitters, and Egg Whites

items.title: Classic Manhattan
items.description: Bulleit Rye Small Batch American Whiskey, Carpano Antica Sweet Vermouth, Angostura Bitters, and Luxardo Gourmet Maraschino Cherries served with an Ice Sphere made from locally sourced Purified Water

items.title: Tequila Daisy
items.description: Don Julio Reposado Tequila, Cointreau, Crème de Violette Liqueur, fresh Lime Juice, Organic Agave Nectar, and Egg Whites, served up

items.title: Old Fashioned
items.description: Woodford Reserve Bourbon with Angostura and Orange Bitters, a Luxardo Gourmet Maraschino Cherry, and served with an Ice Sphere made from locally sourced Purified Water

items.title: Classic Gin & Tonic
items.description: Hendrick’s Gin and Premium Tonic

items.title: Dill Gin & Tonic
items.description: Plymouth Gin, Premium Tonic, Zesty Deli Dill Pickle Brine, locally grown Organic Dill, and Lemon Peel

items.title: Botanical Gin & Tonic
items.description: Hendrick's Gin, Premium Tonic, Star Anise, Cardamom, and Mint

items.title: Sparkling Mare
items.description: Saint-Hilaire Sparkling Wine, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, and Aperol Orange Aperitif

items.title: Double Pear Martini
items.description: Double Cross and Absolut Pears Vodkas, Pear Nectar, and fresh Lime Juice complemented with a marinated Baby Pear, served up

items.title: Club Mojito
items.description: Bacardi Superior Rum, Organic Mint from nearby farms, fresh Lime Juice, and Organic Agave Nectar topped with locally sourced Purified Sparkling Water served over Crushed Ice

items.title: Bloody Mary
items.description: Hanson of Sonoma Habanero Organic Vodka, Bloody Mary Mix, Barbecue Bitters, and Dill Pickle Brine garnished with a locally grown Organic Dill Sprig and a dehydrated Horseradish-crusted Tomato Slice

items.title: Irish Coffee
items.description: Jameson Irish Whiskey, hot Coffee and two Sugar Cubes topped with frothy Cream

items.title: Vintage Coffee
items.description: Baileys Irish Cream, Tuaca and a splash of hot Coffee served in a Snifter Glass with a stick of Cinnamon

items.title: B-52 Coffee
items.description: Grand Marnier, Kahlúa, Baileys Irish Cream, and hot Coffee topped with fresh House-made Whipped Cream

items.title: Golden Road Golden State Cerveza, Los Angeles
Bootlegger's Old World Hefeweizen
items.description: Fullerton, (5.0% ABV)

items.title: Stone Brewery Delicious IPA
items.description: Escondido, (7.7% ABV)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Brewing Company, 70th Anniversary IPA, San Diego CA. (ABV 7.0%)
items.description: An intensely single-hopped American IPA bursting with Grapefruit Aromas, Citrus, and Tropical Fruit Flavors (ABV 7.0%)

items.title: Karl Strauss® Red Trolley Ale, San Diego
Firestone Walker Double Barrel Ale, Paso Robles
North Coast Red Seal Ale, Fort Bragg
Ballast Point Sculpin IPA, San Diego
Sparkling, Banfi, Rosa Regale Brachetto d'Acqui, Piedmont, Italy 2021
Riesling, Dr. Loosen, Dr. L, Mosel, Germany 2021
Sauvignon Blanc, Bella Grace, Amador County 2021
Sauvignon Blanc, Wither Hills, Marlborough, New Zealand
Viognier, Zaca Mesa, Santa Ynez Valley
Chenin Blanc, Marc Bredif, Vouvray, Loire
Pinot Noir, Hartford Court, Lands Edge, Sonoma Coast
Syrah, Alexander Valley Vineyards, Sonoma County
Zinfandel, Ridge Three Valleys, Sonoma County
Cabernet Sauvignon, Jackson Estate, Alexander Valley, Sonoma County
Rose Petal Soda
items.description: locally sourced Purified Sparkling Water flavored with delicate Rose Essence and garnished with an edible Sugar-glazed Organic Rose Petal

items.title: Wildberry Lemonade
items.description: All-Natural Lemonade with flavors of Blackberry, Strawberry, Raspberry, and Blueberry with a spritz of Purified Sparkling Water

items.title: Twin Bill
items.description: a classic combination of natural Lemonade and Iced Tea lightly sweetened with Organic Agave Nectar

items.title: Water
items.description: Premium Still (1 L) or Premium Sparkling (1 L)

items.title: Coffee
items.description: Regular or Decaf
